name: Phase Shifted: Souls Like Game
description:
Made for Curdle Jam #19

Theme: INSIDE-OUT

Currently no Objective but will have one in the full version

You play as the Main Character in this story, You always felt like something was wrong nothing ever felt real for you, one day you fount out that early in your life some bad men came to your house and injected you with some weird fluid, they told your parents that it was a Shot for the Flu but over those years something was happening to you mentally. One day out of no where you just snap into a different reality and you can't get out of it. you have brief Moments where you can snap back to reality but it doesnt last for long. use this ability to your advantage in this Unknown Reality.

Cut Content Due to time limit restraints:

AI Boss Fights.

Story.

More Abilities.

Loot Chest.

More Enemy Types.
